title: Ghost hunters
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Walford Hewitson, Frank Spiller and Erik Nielsen
brief_description: A flight in the Royal Canadian Air Force’s Argus airplane, to Gibraltar and back, provides a convincing demonstration of Canada’s wide-ranging defense against underwater attack. Specially designed and electronically equipped for detecting submarines, this tireless airborne hunter can stay aloft a full day, probing for its hidden foe.
